Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- 1st Justice of the Peace Ward
Constable -- 3rd Justice of the Peace Ward
Labadieville GDD No. 3 -- Acreage Renewal Tax - BOC- 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Labadieville Gravity Drainage District No. 3 Proposition
(Acreage Renewal)

Summary:  Authority to continue to levy and collect annually for a period of ten years an acreage tax of not exceeding thirty-five cents an acre for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works in said District.
Race.FullText: Shall the Labadieville Gravity Drainage District No. 3 of Assumption Parish, Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy and collect annually for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (an estimated $2,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the acreage tax for an entire year), an acreage tax or forced contribution, not to exceed thirty-five cents (.35) per acre, on each and every acre of land in said District for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works in the District?
